verses.verse: When the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> delayed <S%H954><s%> to come down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H6950><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H6965><s%> "Come, make <S%H6213><s%> us gods, <S%H430><s%> which shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us; <S%H4872><s%> for as for this Moses, the man <S%H376><s%> who brought <S%H5927><s%> us up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> we don't <S%H3045><s%> know what has become of him."

Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H6561><s%> "Take off the golden <S%H2091><s%> rings, <S%H5141><s%> which are in the ears <S%H241><s%> of your wives, <S%H802><s%> of your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and of your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and bring them to me. <S%H935><s%>"
All the people <S%H5971><s%> took off <S%H6561><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H5141><s%> which were in their ears, <S%H241><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

He received <S%H3947><s%> what they handed <S%H3027><s%> him, <S%H6696><s%> and fashioned it with an engraving tool, <S%H2747><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> it a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf; <S%H5695><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> "These are your gods, <S%H430><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which brought <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

When Aaron <S%H175><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> this, <S%H1129><s%> he built an altar <S%H4196><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it; <S%H175><s%> and Aaron made a proclamation, <S%H7121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> shall be a feast <S%H2282><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"

They rose up early <S%H7925><s%> on the next day, <S%H4283><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and brought <S%H5066><s%> peace offerings; <S%H8002><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> down to eat <S%H398><s%> and to drink, <S%H8354><s%> and rose up <S%H6965><s%> to play. <S%H6711><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go, <S%H3212><s%> get down; <S%H3381><s%> for your people, <S%H5971><s%> who you brought <S%H5927><s%> up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> have corrupted themselves! <S%H7843><s%>

They have turned <S%H5493><s%> aside quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them. <S%H6213><s%> They have made themselves a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf, <S%H5695><s%> and have worshiped <S%H7812><s%> it, <S%H2076><s%> and have sacrificed to it, <S%H559><s%> and said, <S%H430><s%> 'These are your gods, Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which brought you up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>'"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "I have seen <S%H7200><s%> these people, <S%H5971><s%> and behold, <S%H7186><s%> they are a stiff-necked people. <S%H5971><s%>

Now therefore leave me alone, <S%H3240><s%> that my wrath <S%H639><s%> may burn hot <S%H2734><s%> against them, <S%H3615><s%> and that I may consume them; <S%H6213><s%> and I will make of you a great <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> begged <S%H2470><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> why does your wrath <S%H639><s%> burn hot <S%H2734><s%> against your people, <S%H5971><s%> that you have brought out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand? <S%H3027><s%>

Why should the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3318><s%> 'He brought them forth for evil, <S%H7451><s%> to kill <S%H2026><s%> them in the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and to consume <S%H3615><s%> them from the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the earth? <S%H127><s%>' Turn <S%H7725><s%> from your fierce <S%H2740><s%> wrath, <S%H639><s%> and repent <S%H5162><s%> of this evil <S%H7451><s%> against your people. <S%H5971><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Israel, <S%H3478><s%> your servants, <S%H5650><s%> to whom you swore <S%H7650><s%> by your own self, <S%H1696><s%> and said to them, <S%H7235><s%> 'I will multiply your seed <S%H2233><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and all this land <S%H776><s%> that I have spoken <S%H559><s%> of I will give <S%H5414><s%> to your seed, <S%H2233><s%> and they shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> it forever. <S%H5769><s%>'"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> repented <S%H5162><s%> of the evil <S%H7451><s%> which he said <S%H1696><s%> he would do <S%H6213><s%> to his people. <S%H5971><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> turned, <S%H6437><s%> and went down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> with the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> that were written <S%H3789><s%> on both <S%H8147><s%> their sides; <S%H5676><s%> on the one side and on the other they were written. <S%H3789><s%>

The tablets <S%H3871><s%> were the work <S%H4639><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and the writing <S%H4385><s%> was the writing <S%H4385><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> engraved <S%H2801><s%> on the tables. <S%H3871><s%>

When Joshua <S%H3091><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> as they shouted, <S%H7452><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "There is the noise <S%H6963><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "It isn't <S%H6963><s%> the voice of those who shout <S%H6030><s%> for victory, <S%H1369><s%> neither is it the voice <S%H6963><s%> of those who cry <S%H6030><s%> for being overcome; <S%H2476><s%> but the noise <S%H6963><s%> of those who sing <S%H6031><s%> that I hear. <S%H8085><s%>"

It happened, <S%H7126><s%> as soon as he came near to the camp, <S%H4264><s%> that he saw <S%H7200><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> and the dancing: <S%H4246><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%>' anger <S%H639><s%> grew hot, <S%H2734><s%> and he threw <S%H7993><s%> the tablets <S%H3871><s%> out of his hands, <S%H3027><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> them beneath <S%H8478><s%> the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

He took <S%H3947><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> which they had made, <S%H6213><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> it with fire, <S%H784><s%> ground <S%H2912><s%> it to powder, <S%H1854><s%> and scattered <S%H2219><s%> it on <S%H6440><s%> the water, <S%H4325><s%> and made the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> drink of it. <S%H8248><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "What did <S%H6213><s%> these people <S%H5971><s%> do to you, <S%H935><s%> that you have brought a great <S%H1419><s%> sin on them? <S%H2401><s%>"

Aaron <S%H175><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Don't <S%H639><s%> let the anger of my lord <S%H113><s%> grow hot. <S%H2734><s%> You know <S%H3045><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> that they are set on evil. <S%H7451><s%>

For they said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H6213><s%> 'Make us gods, <S%H430><s%> which shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us; <S%H4872><s%> for as for this Moses, the man <S%H376><s%> who brought us up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> we don't <S%H3045><s%> know what has become of him.'

I said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2091><s%> 'Whoever has any gold, let them take <S%H6561><s%> it off: <S%H5414><s%>' so they gave it to me; <S%H7993><s%> and I threw it into the fire, <S%H784><s%> and out <S%H3318><s%> came this calf. <S%H5695><s%>"

When Moses <S%H4872><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> had broken loose, <S%H6544><s%> (for Aaron <S%H175><s%> had let them loose <S%H6544><s%> for a derision <S%H8103><s%> among their enemies <S%H6965><s%>),

then Moses <S%H4872><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Whoever is on Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s side, <S%H1121><s%> come to me!" All the sons of Levi <S%H3878><s%> gathered themselves together to him. <S%H622><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H559><s%> "Thus says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H376><s%> 'Every man put <S%H7760><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> on his thigh, <S%H3409><s%> and go <S%H5674><s%> back and forth <S%H7725><s%> from gate <S%H8179><s%> to gate <S%H8179><s%> throughout the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> kill <S%H2026><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> his companion, <S%H7453><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> his neighbor. <S%H7138><s%>'"

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses: <S%H4872><s%> and there fell <S%H5307><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> about three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Consecrate yourselves <S%H4390><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> yes, <S%H3588><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> against his son, <S%H1121><s%> and against his brother; <S%H251><s%> that he may bestow <S%H5414><s%> on you a blessing <S%H1293><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%>"

It happened on the next day, <S%H4283><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "You have sinned <S%H2398><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin. <S%H2401><s%> Now I will go up <S%H5927><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Perhaps <S%H194><s%> I shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> your sin. <S%H2403><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Oh, <S%H577><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> have sinned <S%H2398><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin, <S%H2401><s%> and have made <S%H6213><s%> themselves gods <S%H430><s%> of gold. <S%H2091><s%>
Yet now, <S%H5375><s%> if you will, forgive their sin <S%H2403><s%>—and if not, <S%H4229><s%> please blot me out of your book <S%H5612><s%> which you have written. <S%H3789><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Whoever <S%H834><s%> has sinned <S%H2398><s%> against me, <S%H4229><s%> him will I blot out of my book. <S%H5612><s%>

Now go, <S%H3212><s%> lead <S%H5148><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to the place of which I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you. <S%H4397><s%> Behold, my angel shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you. <S%H3117><s%> Nevertheless in the day when I punish, <S%H6485><s%> I will punish <S%H6485><s%> them for their sin. <S%H2403><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> struck <S%H5062><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> the calf, <S%H5695><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> made. <S%H6213><s%>
